issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Titanium crashes in CLI or in its command window when executing "ti build -p android".

The folder "Fichiers Communs" (i.e. Common Files) can't be read by Titanium, and genymotion.js's scan function crashes.

"Solved" hideously by adding a continue based on the folder's name, but I hope you won't take this for a potential solution.
fields.summary: Error while loading Android emulator list
